thread.section_title: The Westin Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, beds not uber comfortable
thread.title_full: Great location, beds not uber comfortable - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: roanth
title: Great location, beds not uber comfortable
text: I stayed here with three friends on a girls long weekend. The location of this hotel was amazing and worked out very well for us. An easy walk to the Louvre, Museum D' Orsay and more. Metro stations also close by. We were fortunately to get two adjoining rooms which worked well. Unfortunately, I was surprisingly disappointed with the quality of the beds, which were quite hard. Also, the pillows were extremely fluffy with minimal support. Not usually things I comment on but this was quite noticeable.
